mapper.select: select c.id,release_username as commentUserUsername , su.head_picture as commentUserPicture , content as commentContent ,c.create_time as createTime, su.nickname commentUserNickname, (select count(*) from comment where be_commented_code = c.id and c.is_del = 0) commentNumber from comment c left join sys_user su on c.release_username = su.username where be_commented_code = #{id} and c.is_del = 0 and su.is_del = 0 order by c.create_time desc

select c.release_username as commentUserUsername,c.content as commentContent ,su.head_picture as commentUserPicture, su.nickname as commentUserNickname from comment as c left join sys_user su on c.release_username = su.username where su.is_del = 0 and c.is_del = 0 and c.id = #{id} order by c.create_time desc
